column1: There was an old man living in those days who used to frequent the fairs that were held across the mountains. One day he was crossing the mountains to a fair
column2: and when he got to a lonely valley he sat down
column4: and he dropped off to sleep
column5: and his bag fell down by his side. When he was sound asleep the fairies came and carried him off
column7: and took him under the earth
column8: and when he awoke he found himself in a great palace of gold
column9: full of fairies dancing and singing. And they took him and showed him everything
column10: the splendid gold room and gardens
column11: and they kept dancing round him until he fell asleep.When he was asleep they carried him back to the same spot where they had found him
column12: and when he awoke he thought he had been dreaming
column13: so he looked for his bag
column15: but he could hardly lift it. When he opened it he found it was nearly filled with gold.
